mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password_hash, name, role, account_locked, failed_login_attempts, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET last_login_at = #{lastLoginAt}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET failed_login_attempts = #{attempts}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET account_locked = true, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password_hash, name, role, account_locked, failed_login_attempts, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{name}, #{role}, #{accountLocked}, #{failedLoginAttempts}, #{lastLoginAt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
